description: Sheet operations applied to each individual file

commands.description: Add a sheet to each individual files, defaults to end of file

parameters.name: tile
parameters.description: Name of sheet to be added

commands.description: Rename a sheet in all individual files

parameters.name: old_title
parameters.description: Name of sheet to be renamed

commands.description: Move a sheet to specified location in all individual files

parameters.name: tile
parameters.description: Name of sheet to be moved

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location to which sheet will be moved

commands.description: Delete a sheet from all individual files

parameters.name: tile
parameters.description: Name of sheet to be deleted

description: Column operations that affect all individual files

commands.description: Insert a column into specified sheet in all files, defaults to last column

parameters.name: sheet
parameters.description: Sheet in which column will be inserted

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: Title of column to be inserted

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position in which column will be inserted

commands.description: Rename specified column in all individual files

parameters.name: sheet
parameters.description: Sheet in which column will be renamed

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: Name of column to be renamed

commands.description: Move specified column in individual files to specified position

parameters.name: sheet
parameters.description: Sheet in which column will be renamed

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: Name of column to be renamed

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: Position to which column would be moved

commands.description: Delete specified column from individual files

parameters.name: sheet
parameters.description: Sheet in which column will be deleted

parameters.name: column
parameters.description: Name of column to be deleted

commands.description: Creates a blank file with the title specified
Creates a new file from the template with the title specified
Reads a file with a list of names and creates multiple new files with those titles
Creates multiple blank files using the file specified as titles

parameters.name: file
description: File containing the list of filenames, one per line

commands.description: Creates multiple new files from template using the file specified as titles

parameters.name: file
description: File containing the list of filenames, one per line

parameters.name: suffix
description: Phrase to put at the end of every title i.e. "put on website"
Deletes the first file with the specified title

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Title of file to be deleted
